name: Sleep Away
description:
A short trilogy adventure about your own story. Designed and developed by Sam Feng from the LuHi Game Dev Club.  Powered by Unreal Engine 4.

Most the resource and sound are taken from Yobi3D, Google Image, Netease Music and Freesound, if there's a copyright issue or if you found a glitch, please contact with me, thank you!

Sleep Away uses the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2018, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.
